00019 #include "AdjacencyMatrix.h"

00026 template<int M>
00027 StrumTriggsSolver<M>::StrumTriggsSolver(MotionMatrix<M> &P,
00028                                         ShapeMatrix &S) :
00029   motion(P),
00030   shape(S)
00031 {
00032 }

00034 
00040 template<int M>
00041 void StrumTriggsSolver<M>::solve(const MeasurementMatrix<M> &E) {
00042   Eigen::JacobiSVD<typename MeasurementMatrix<M>::Base>         svd;
00043   ImageTransform<M>                             denormalisation;
00044 
00045   measurement = E;
00046   measurement.normalise(denormalisation);
00047   approx_scale();
00048   factorise_with_occlusions(motion, shape);
00049   measurement.scale_and_fill(motion, shape);
00050   svd.compute(measurement, Eigen::ComputeThinV | Eigen::ComputeThinU);
00051   motion = svd.matrixU().leftCols(4);
00052   motion *= svd.singularValues().topRows(4).asDiagonal();
00053 
00054   std::cout << "Strum-Triggs singular values are:" << std::endl;
00055   std::cout << svd.singularValues() << std::endl;
00056 
00057   denormalisation.apply_to(motion);
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00067 template<int M>
00068 void StrumTriggsSolver<M>::factorise_with_occlusions(MotionMatrix<M> &motion, 
00069                                                      ShapeMatrix &shape) {
00070   MeasurementMatrix<M>  notMotion;      // nullspace of this is motion matrix
00071   MeasurementMatrix<M>  subspace;       // nullspace of this is a constraint
00072                                         // on motionMatrix
00073   int           i, j, j0;
00074   int           c;
00075   int           srank;
00076   int           nmRank;
00077   const double  singular_cutoff=0.001;  // cutoff value for rank calculation
00078 
00079   // --- calculate motion matrix
00080   // --- from subspace constraints
00081   // -----------------------------
00082   c = 0;
00083   nmRank = 0;
00084   while(c<measurement.cols()) {
00085     // --- create constraint
00086     subspace.delete_columns(0,subspace.cols());
00087     for(j = 0; c<measurement.cols() && j<4; ++j) {
00088       // --- add a column to subspace
00089       j0 = subspace.insert_column_and_expand(measurement.col(c));
00090       ++c;
00091       srank = subspace.rank(singular_cutoff);
00092       while(c<measurement.cols() && srank < subspace.cols() && srank < 3*M) {
00093         subspace.delete_columns(j0, subspace.cols()-j0);
00094         j0 = subspace.insert_column_and_expand(measurement.col(c));
00095         ++c;
00096       }
00097     }
00098 
00099     // --- add nullspace of constraint to notMotion
00100     if(j == 4 && subspace.cols() < 3*M) {
00101       notMotion.new_columns(3*M-subspace.cols());
00102       notMotion.rightCols(3*M-subspace.cols()) = subspace.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU).matrixU().rightCols(3*M-subspace.cols());
00103       nmRank = notMotion.rank(singular_cutoff);
00104     }
00105   }
00106   
00107   if(nmRank < 3*M-4) {
00108     throw("Too many occlusions to fill in the Measurement matrix.");
00109   }
00110 
00111   // --- motion is approximate nullspace of the complement
00112   motion = notMotion.jacobiSvd(Eigen::ComputeFullU).matrixU().rightCols(4);
00113 
00114   shape.solve(measurement, motion);
00115 }

00123 template<int M>
00124 void StrumTriggsSolver<M>::
00125 create_connectivity_graph(Eigen::Matrix<double,M,M> &G) {
00126   int           v1,v2,j;
00127   int           connections;
00128   const double  k = -0.2;
00129 
00130   G.fill(1e6);
00131   for(v1 = 0; v1<M; ++v1) {
00132     for(v2 = v1+1; v2<M; ++v2) {
00133       j = 0;
00134       connections = 0;
00135       while(j < measurement.cols() && connections < 50) {
00136         if(measurement.pixel(v1,j)(2) > 0 && measurement.pixel(v2,j)(2) > 0) {
00137           ++connections;
00138         }
00139         ++j;
00140       }
00141       if(connections > 7) {
00142         G(v1,v2) = G(v2,v1) = exp(k*connections);
00143       }
00144     }
00145   }
00146 }
00147 
00154 template<int M>
00155 void StrumTriggsSolver<M>::approx_scale() {
00156   AdjacencyMatrix<M>            view_connections;
00157   int                           tree_root;
00158   Eigen::Matrix<int,M,1>        spanning_tree;
00159   Eigen::Matrix<bool,M,1>       scaled;
00160   Eigen::Vector3d               cross_prod, pix;
00161   int                           v,pt,parent;
00162   bool                          updated;
00163   double                        scale;
00164   double                        parent_scale, child_scale;
00165   FundamentalMatrix             F[M];
00166   ImageTransform<M>             denormalisation;
00167 
00168   // --- create spanning tree of views
00169   // ---------------------------------
00170   create_connectivity_graph(view_connections);
00171   view_connections.shortest_spanning_tree(tree_root, spanning_tree);
00172   scaled.fill(false);
00173   scaled(tree_root) = true;
00174   std::cout << "Spanning tree = " << std::endl << spanning_tree << std::endl; 
00175 
00176   // --- create fundamental matrices for
00177   // --- each edge in the spanning tree 
00178   // ----------------------------------
00179   for(v = 0; v<M; ++v) {
00180     if(v != tree_root) {
00181       F[v].eight_point_algorithm(measurement.view(v),
00182                                  measurement.view(spanning_tree(v)));      
00183     }
00184   }
00185 
00186   // --- Do scaling over tree
00187   // ------------------------
00188   updated = true;
00189   while(updated) {
00190     updated = false;
00191     for(v = 0; v<M; ++v) {
00192       parent = spanning_tree(v);
00193       if(!scaled(v) && scaled(parent)) {
00194         // --- scale between v and parent of v
00195         for(pt = 0; pt<measurement.cols(); ++pt) {
00196           if(measurement.pixel(v,pt)(2) != 0.0) {
00197             if(measurement.pixel(parent,pt)(2) != 0.0) {
00198               pix = measurement.pixel(v,pt);
00199               cross_prod = F[v].e_ij().cross(pix);
00200               scale = cross_prod.dot(F[v]*measurement.pixel(parent,pt))/
00201                 cross_prod.dot(cross_prod);
00202               measurement.pixel(v,pt) *= scale;
00203             } else {
00204               // --- parent missing so all descendants are unscaled
00205               measurement.pixel(v,pt)(2) = -0.0;
00206             }
00207           }
00208         }
00209         scaled(v) = true;
00210         updated = true;
00211       }
00212     }
00213   }
00214 }
